nodes.text: The Dalisor system was a star system located within the Yushan sector, a part of the Mid Rim and Western Reaches regions. It lay on the Corellian Trade Spine super-hyperroute, which connected it to the Kaal and Jiroch systems. The Dalisor system shared its name with the Dalisor Merchant Fleet.
The Dalisor system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-17.
